COOL DINOSAUR: THE VIDEO GAMe

this may at first look like a game made with rpgmaker deafult assets, but it is a true masterpiece. you play as cool dinosaur, they are somebody that exists.

you fight a bad guy.  I won't spoil anything though since it's such an epic adventure

you will be asked this question at the start of the game, choose wisely, as it will effect the several endings in the game. all of which are equally as epic.
